title: One Piece Episode 368 Recap: The Silent Assault!! The Mysterious Visitor, 'Tyrant' Kuma
author: The Adult Swim Squad
description: Detailed written recap and analysis of Episode 368, covering Nami's pursuit of Perona, Kuma's dramatic arrival, the battle against Oars, and Luffy's discovery that he's been chasing Moria's shadow. Includes scene-by-scene breakdown with character insights.
